Posts.Content: Hi NicoleMM I completely understand what you are going through. I have found two lumps in my right breast. My doctor also felt them and sent me for an ultrasound and Mammogram. The lab ladies could feel them but nothing showed on either of the tests... I have since gone back to my doctor and he told me because we can feel but not see the lumps then he is sending me to a Breast Surgeon. I see him on the 20th of April....it is then we will determine what to do. I would like to have them Biopsied or removed. I am sure they are nothing more than cysts or breast tissue...but i do want to be 100% sure as we can't prove that on the ultrasound... You aren't alone....let me know what you find out.. Twiggy
Posts.Title: Inconclusive Mammogram & Ultrasound

Posts.Content: Hi, I would certainly have them feel it while you are standing...in any position that you need to be in to have it felt the best. I had a lump ( benign ) that was felt easier if my arm was relaxed by my side rather than over my head...not sure why... Also I had to find the lump with my fingers first...to give them an idea where to feel....my lump was about the size of a quarter when they removed it...and could still be hard to feel in certain positions.. I guess it the way the breast tissue is around it. ?? I am glad that you are getting a second opinion...i would also ask for an ultra sound...and mammogram... Let me know how it goes.. Twiggy
Posts.Title: Found a lump.

Posts.Content: Hi, Glad to hear from ya..and that you have your apt. I was to be at the hospital at least an hour early...and then of course had to wait longer than that! ha! they were a bit behind. I did have a local...the breast was totally frozen...feels very odd.. I didn't have any sedation...i was pretty calm and didn't want or need any. I can understand your nervousness..i was too...extremely. Mostly cause i didn't know what to expect...with the whole procedure. It was a lot eaiser and better than i expected....we always think the worst right?! My lump was almost under my nipple on the inside of my right breast... I didn't have any pain with it at all. I was at my doctor this morning as i am still having pain under where my incision is...running down to the middle of my ribcage. He thinks it is nerves healing... was odd cause the pain didn't start till a month after my surgery...just feels like a bruise..no color or anything.. guess it is normal.. ha! I hope this helps abit...and please ask as many as you want! glad i can help.. keep me posted!! hugs, Twiggy
Posts.Title: Breast Lump Felt but Not Seen? 1 2

Posts.Content: Hi! So glad everything has gone well for you...and my surgeon told me my lump looked fine too...made me feel a lot better...and it was all fine! that is great! Hope you heal quicky..and please take it easy! don't push yourself... Please let us know when you see him for the follow up...praying for ya.. I had a friend call me this morning. She works with me and had been off work for the last few months fighting Colon cancer. She called this morning to ask about my breast cancer scare...as she had a mammogram this week and got a call that they found a lump. she is so scared as she is in the middle of chemo for cancer already... She goes for an utlrasound soon...see if it is just a cycst or what... I am sure she will be fine...but i am finding it hard...she is still coming to terms with the one cancer..and now this...breaks my heart...Trying to be strong for her... Please pray for her.. thanks for listening.. hugs, Twiggy
Posts.Title: Breast Lump Felt but Not Seen? 1 2

Posts.Content: hi there, how are you feeling? healing ok? hope all is well.. I am so anxious to hear your results... I am going out to of town Thursday evening...for the long weekend ( in Canada) but will try my darnedest to get on line and see how you are. I got an email from my friend yesterday...she had her ultrasound and the tech (even though she wasn't susposed to say anything) told her she had nothing to worry about....looks like a cyst..whoo hoo! Thank you so much for your prayers! hugs, Twiggy
Posts.Title: Breast Lump Felt but Not Seen? 1 2

Posts.Content: hi.. glad to hear that he thinks it is benign... I did the out paitent as well..it was done in the hospital...had a local. The whole thing took about an hour. I got to watch the whole thing...was quite interesting in a odd way... Saw what the 'lump' looked like... I took the day off work the next day as it is uncomfortable....was very sensative for over a week... My scar is about an inch long...he did the incision around my nipple as the lump was kinda 1/2 under it...so the scar should fade into the nipple...ya! My fibroadenoma was about the size of a quarter...so i am thinking maybe your scar will be smaller?? not sure. When do you go in to get it removed? I think you are doing the right thing...it would have drove me nuts to have it in me and not be 100% sure what it was...even my surgeon said that.. Glad that i did it.. Please let me know how it goes for you! hugs, Twiggy
Posts.Title: Breast Lump Felt but Not Seen? 1 2

Posts.Content: Hi Starr92 was wondering how things are going for you? any update? let me know.. Twiggy
Posts.Title: Breast Lump Felt but Not Seen? 1 2

Posts.Content: I left right away....they sewed me up...bandaged me...gave me a prescription for pain killers...and home i went.. My hubby was with me of course...i didn't want to have to drive... I got the results over a week later...but the surgeon was pretty sure by seeing the lump that it was fine...that made me feel good. although I still stressed till the moment i heard it was benign... then i cried... didn't realize how stressed i was about the whole thing till it was over. Must say i am parinoid now....i worry about it more...more aware i guess.. which i supose is good..to a point.. Hang in there! thinking about you! Twiggy
Posts.Title: Breast Lump Felt but Not Seen? 1 2

Posts.Content: hi.. so glad you are doing ok... I did have pain to...mine started a few weeks after my surgery...it went almost in a straight line from my incision to the middle of my ribs. hurt to touch as well...like a brusie but with no discoloration or anything...just an odd pain. I talked to my doc about it..and a few other ladies who had the same thing. It is nerve pain...from them healing. I would still mention it to your doc though..just to be safe. My thoughts are with you!! tons of hugs!! Twiggy
Posts.Title: Breast Lump Felt but Not Seen? 1 2

Posts.Content: WHOO HOO!! that is great news!! so glad for you! thank goodness!! hope you are celebrating! you are so welcome...so glad it turned out all good! Take care of yourself! hugs, twiggy!
Posts.Title: Breast Lump Felt but Not Seen? 1 2

Posts.Content: Hi, I had a lump in my breast back in April that i had removed and biopsied was benign...but it started out the same way...i could feel it..the doc and techs could feel it but couldn't see it on either the ultrasound or mam. Because we couldn't see it my doc sent me to a breast surgeon and we decided for my peace of mind ( he thought all along that it was benign) that we should remove it. Like he said...we can't be 100% sure by just feeling it. So we removed it. It was about the size of a quarter. If it worries you at all...ask for it to be biopsied. That is the only way you will know 100% what it is...and for your own peace. Let us know how things go.. hugs, Twiggy (Oh...i am 32)
Posts.Title: Breast Lump Felt but Not Seen? 1 2

Posts.Content: Hi! Just checking in to see how you are doing....hope all is well.. Hear from you soon! hugs, Twiggy
Posts.Title: Breast Lump Felt but Not Seen? 1 2

Posts.Content: hi, How did your apt go? Are you going to get a mammogram and or ultrasound done? I had found a lump partially under my nipple too...didn't show up on either mam. or ultrasound...so I had it removed...it was benign.. Mine was about the diameter of a quarter...not mobile.. Let us know how it goes Hugs, Twiggy
Posts.Title: Need input on new lump

Posts.Content: Hi all, Earlier this year i had found a lump in my right breast...after all the tests and waiting i had it removed and it was..thank goodness Benign.. Well i am back here again...found a lump in my Left breast. I am hoping it is the same as the first...but of course will have it looked at. Is it common to have more than one Benign lump? in diff. breasts? I am curious to see if this one will show on the Mammogram or Ultra sound as the last one didn't. I really am not looking forward to this again....and i am amazed how quick it formed. I have been even more fanatical about checking my breast each month since the last experience...and felt nothing until about 2 weeks ago...then this one....it is about the size of a marble. how do they grow so fast? I don't get it. I am really trying hard to not get as worried and as upset as the last time...as the chances are that it is just a benign tumor..but at the same time it is very hard to not. Oh well...see what happens.. hugs, Twiggy
Posts.Title: Back again...found another lump

Posts.Content: i found a lump on my right breast...inside near my nipple. went to my doc today and am now going to get a mammogram and ultrasound done...but not till the 2nd of March.... I am trying so hard to relax...and keep in mind that it is probably nothing....but man is that hard....as i am sure you all know... anyway...just needed to ramble....i don't want to tell anyone and make people worry...just needed to vent abit.. Dana
Posts.Title: found a lump in my breast

Posts.Content: today...and an ultrasound. Nothing showed on the ultrasound. You can feel the lumps but nothing came up. So they sent me for the mammogram. What does that mean? The lab tech said that since they didn't show up on the ultrasound they aren't cysts....the one maybe just the ridge of breast tissue...but the other? What if they don't show on the mammogram? I am a bit confused...and scared... thanks, Twiggy
Posts.Title: had my Mammogram....

Posts.Content: hi...and thank you! I am telling myself..and of course my friends htat i have told are also 'sure' that is a cyst...my doc seems to think that too.. trying to stay positive. I called the lab today and got myself on the cancelation list..maybe get in to have the Mammogram earlier...take my mind off things.... can't wait till the waiting is over with.. thanks again,
Posts.Title: found a lump in my breast

Posts.Content: Hi I am 32....and found a lump about 3 weeks ago...my doc ordered a Mammogram and ultrasound but i couldn't get into the lab till this Wed! I have been worrying of almost 3 weeks... I know that 8 0ut of 10 lumps in the breast are benign but of course i still worry...just want to know... I do understand how you feel...I am not in school...but do have a fulltime job and a family.. I pray that all is ok for you.. hang in there...and do keep us updated.. hugs, Twiggy
Posts.Title: Doc found a lump :(
